mapper.select: SELECT notice_no noticeNo, notice_title noticeTitle FROM notice ORDER BY notice_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT notice_no noticeNo, notice_title noticeTitle, notice_content noticeContent, createdate FROM notice WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(notice_title, notice_content, member_id, notice_pw) VALUES(#{noticeTitle},#{noticeContent},#{memberId},PASSWORD(#{noticePw}));
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, notice_content = #{noticeContent} WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM notice WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo} AND notice_pw = PASSWORD(#{noticePw});
